text: 22:5 Aisaia 60:19; Daniel 7:18; 7:27; 2 Timoti 2:12; Akar Mogomem 5:10; 20:6; 21:23-25God en Ekiam, angazangarim gumazamizibar anɨngtɨ, kamaghɨn dɨmagarim uam otivan kogham, eghtɨ lam ko aruemɨn angazangariba ua ingangariba puvatɨgham. Eghtɨ Godɨn gumazamiziba, me atrivibar mɨn zurara ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam.
